contentrichtext.text: {{for|the [[Romania]]n commune called Rumes in German|Romos}} {{Infobox Belgium Municipality |name=Rumes |picture= |picture-legend= |map=Rumes Hainaut Belgium Map.png |map-legend=The municipality in the province of Hainaut |arms=Blason ville be Rumes.svg |flag= |region={{BE-REG-WAL}} |community={{BE-FR}} |province={{BE-PROV-HT}} |arrondissement=[[Arrondissement of Tournai|Tournai]] |nis=57072 |pyramid-date= |0-19= |20-64 |65 |foreigners= |foreigners-date |mayor=Jean Waleckx (PS) |majority=PS |postal-codes=7610-7618 |telephone-area=069 |web=[http://www.rumes-online.be/ www.rumes-online.be] |lat_deg=50 |lat_min=33 |lon_deg=03 |lon_min=18 }} '''Rumes''' is a [[Wallonia|Walloon]] [[municipality]] located in the [[Belgium|Belgian]] province of [[Hainaut (province)|Hainaut]]. On 1 January 2006 the municipality had 5,112 inhabitants. The total area is 23.72 km², giving a [[population density]] of 216 inhabitants per km². ==References== {{reflist}} {{Hainaut}} [[Category:Municipalities of Hainaut (province)]] {{Hainaut-geo-stub}}
